about_the_game:
ENGAGE THE ENEMY FACE-TO-FACE!

Prepare to confront your foes up close and personal.

Endless Missions, Boundless Freedom


"United Assault - World War 2" offers procedurally generated missions across four meticulously crafted open worlds. Choose your mission objectives in any order or set your own goals; the freedom is yours in this unique World War 2 Sandbox!

Success Rewards, Failure Costs!

Key Features

    []Detailed open worlds faithfully recreated from historical locations: Midway (Pacific), Stalingrad (Eastern Front), Tobruk (North Africa), and Ragusa (Italy).[]NEW! Explore the world and discover loot crates, brimming with ammo, gold, and unique weapons.[]Experience an ever-evolving array of missions thanks to our dynamic mission generator.[]NEW! Secure your hard-earned spoils by using looted gold, saving 50% of your looted XP mid-game at campfires.[]Choose from a formidable arsenal of 45 authentic weapons.[]NEW! Unlock the potential of unique loot guns featuring special bonuses and customized weapons.[]Embark on a rewarding journey with our detailed progression system - fight your way to rank 100!

Prefer a loot-free gaming experience? Simply flip the switch in the options menu to eliminate all loot drops.

ENGAGE THE ENEMY FACE-TO-FACE!

Prepare to confront your foes up close and personal.

Endless Missions, Boundless Freedom


"United Assault - World War 2" offers procedurally generated missions across four meticulously crafted open worlds. Choose your mission objectives in any order or set your own goals; the freedom is yours in this unique World War 2 Sandbox!

Success Rewards, Failure Costs!

Key Features

    []Detailed open worlds faithfully recreated from historical locations: Midway (Pacific), Stalingrad (Eastern Front), Tobruk (North Africa), and Ragusa (Italy).[]NEW! Explore the world and discover loot crates, brimming with ammo, gold, and unique weapons.[]Experience an ever-evolving array of missions thanks to our dynamic mission generator.[]NEW! Secure your hard-earned spoils by using looted gold, saving 50% of your looted XP mid-game at campfires.[]Choose from a formidable arsenal of 45 authentic weapons.[]NEW! Unlock the potential of unique loot guns featuring special bonuses and customized weapons.[]Embark on a rewarding journey with our detailed progression system - fight your way to rank 100!

Prefer a loot-free gaming experience? Simply flip the switch in the options menu to eliminate all loot drops.

short_description: Battle across Pacific, Eastern Front, North Africa, and Western Front in an open-world WWII rogue-lite FPS. Fight on land, sea, and air.
